[比]
Chu Wan-li (1948): Phonetic compound ( OC *piʔ, *pis, *bi, *bis, *biɡ ): phonetic 匕 ( OC *pilʔ ) + phonetic 匕 ( OC *pilʔ ) .
Shuowen: Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 人 ( “ man ” ) + 人 – to juxtapose.
Similar but unrelated to 从 , 尼 , 化 and 北 .

[此]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 止 ( “ feet ” ) + 人 ( “ person ” ) – where a person stops; here.
Alternatively, this may be the original form of 跐 ( OC *ʔsreːʔ, *ʔseʔ, *sʰeʔ, *ʔsreʔ , “to stamp, to stop, to stand”).
